name: aws-serverless-ecommerce-platform
description: Serverless Ecommerce Platform is a sample implementation of a serverless backend for an e-commerce website

scripts.lint:openapi: for openapi in */resources/openapi*.yaml; do echo $openapi; npx speccy lint -r tools/.speccy.rules.yaml $openapi; done
scripts.lint:events: for events in */resources/events*.yaml; do echo $events; npx speccy lint -r tools/.speccy.rules.yaml $events; done
scripts.lint: npm run lint:openapi && npm run lint:events
